result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sharmika Renee Hickles

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Sharmika Renee Hickles in court with attorney Jeff Allen Schwarz.  Defendant Sharmika Renee Hickles in custody.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Upon State's motion and pursuant to negotiations, Court ordered Count #1 dismissed and read-in for sentencing purposes.

Attorney Jeff Allen Schwarz in court, defendant Sharmika Renee Hickles not in court, in custody.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Parties request a Plea Hearing date.
Case adjourned to 06-04-2015 at 8:30 AM - Br. 2, Judge Donald's Court for Plea Hearing.

Attorney Jeffry R Schwartz in court, defendant Sharmika Renee Hickles not in court, in custody and not produced.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Pre-trial conference held off the record. Defendant has a pending felony case in Branch 02, per Deputy Court Clerk transfer approved.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 02.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for April 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings. Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Denise K. or Isaiah M

Defendant Sharmika Renee Hickles in court with attorney Gabriela A. Leija.  Defendant Sharmika Renee Hickles in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
